newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Manila c. bank lowers 1997 trade deficit forecast.
newsitem.headline: Manila c. bank lowers 1997 trade deficit forecast.

text.p: The Philippines expects its trade deficit this year to narrow to $12.536 billion compared with the previous forecast of $13.848 billion, documents from the central bank showed.
The central bank also revised its trade deficit forecast next year to $13.179 billion from its earlier $15.843 billion, the paper, made available to reporters on Monday, showed.
The trade deficit forecast was based on an exchange rate of 28 pesos to a dollar.
